Title: The Box
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developer), Kerry Ehrin (developer), Anthony Cipriano (developer), Carlton Cuse, Kerry Ehrin, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norma returns home in the early morning to find that Norman's bed hasn't been slept in. She soon gets a call from Nick Ford who says that he has Norman and if she wants to see him alive, ...
